hopobject.name: Page
hopobject.body: Could I ask who's calling? ukrain-drug.net "B.C. Hydro doesn't have a money tree, they have customers. And now (Hydro) has found another quarter-of-a-billion dollars? Who else is going to pay?" Horgan also questioned why the province felt it had to pay more than $750 million for Powerex to say it had done nothing wrong. He said he was shocked to hear about the settlement, particularly after meeting earlier this year with then-minister Mike de Jong, who had agreed that the best decision was to defend B.C.'s rights in the dispute.
